title: Stock market gains for second consecutive day
body_lines: The Colombo stock market gained for the second consecutive day reaffirming that investor sentiment has improved.
The active S&PSL20 Index gained by over 7% and the benchmark ASPI by over 4%.
Turnover rose to a recent high of Rs.3 billion involving 140 million shares.
Yesterday the S&PSL20 shot up by 11% and ASPI by over 5% whilst turnover was Rs. 2.18 billion.
Earlier in the week (Monday and Tuesday) the market lost Rs. 600 billion in value after indices crashed by 10% forcing suspension of trading within minutes of opening.
